title: Week 9 Quiz: Strategic Planning
description: Test your knowledge of capital allocation and formal future structures.

items.prompt: Capital Allocation should ideally focus on projects with an IRR that is ___ the WACC.
items.explanation: A company creates value when its return on investment is higher than its cost of capital.

items.prompt: Which phrase indicates a scheduled future event?
options: The IPO is set to occur in June.
I think June is the month.
items.explanation: 'Is set to' is formal and indicates a planned event.

options: A portion of profit paid to shareholders
The cost of building a factory
items.explanation: Dividends are a primary way to return cash to equity holders.

items.prompt: A 'Debt Covenant' often relates to which scenario?
items.explanation: Covenants are tested in the downside case to see if the company will default.

items.prompt: What is the primary difference between a Budget and a Strategic Plan?
options: Time horizon and level of detail
items.explanation: Budgets are short-term and detailed; plans are long-term and strategic.
